recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.author: John Doe
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a separate pan, sauté onion and garlic, then add ground beef and cook until browned. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes. Serve sauce over spaghetti.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.author: Jane Smith
recipes.instructions: In a pan, sauté onion and garlic, then add chicken and cook until browned. Add curry powder and cook for 2 minutes. Add coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-fry
recipes.author: Alice Johnson
recipes.instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan, add garlic and ginger, and sauté for 2 minutes. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Serve with rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.author: Carlos Gomez
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned. Fill taco shells with beef and top with lettuce, cheese, tomato, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.author: Mario Rossi
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). Spread tomato sauce over pizza dough, top with mozzarella cheese and basil leaves, and drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.author: Emily Clark
recipes.instructions: Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, add croutons and grilled chicken, and top with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.author: Sarah Lee
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, eggs, milk, sugar, and baking powder into a batter. Heat butter in a pan, pour batter to form pancakes, and cook until golden brown on both sides. Serve with maple syrup.

recipes.name: Beef Burger
recipes.author: Mike Thompson
recipes.instructions: Form ground beef into patties and cook on a grill until desired doneness. Place patty on a bun and top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, onion, and pickles.

recipes.name: Chicken Sandwich
recipes.author: Add Recipe test
recipes.instructions: Toast the bread and add your favourite veggies in the middle of toasted bread. Add sauce and mayo to enhance the taste.
